ref.div: Reser JP, Bradley GL, Glendon AI, Ellul MC, Callaghan R (2012) Public risk perceptions, understandings and responses to climate change and natural disasters in Australia and Great Britain. National Climate Change Adaptation Research Facility, Gold Coast, Australia. Available: http://www.nccarf.edu.au/publications/public-risk-perceptions-final. Accessed 15 September 2013.
